title: Two Sum
description: Find two numbers that add up to a target using a hash map.

title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
description: Find the maximum profit by choosing a single buy and sell day.

title: Contains Duplicate
description: Check if any value appears at least twice in the array.

title: Product of Array Except Self
description: Return an array where each element is the product except itself.

title: Maximum Subarray
description: Find the contiguous subarray with the maximum sum using dynamic programming.

title: Subarray Sum Equals K
description: Count subarrays whose sum equals k using prefix sums and hash map.

title: Container With Most Water
description: Find two lines that form the container with the most water.

title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
description: Find the longest substring without repeating characters using sliding window.

title: Minimum Window Substring
description: Find the smallest window containing all characters of another string.

title: Longest Consecutive Sequence
description: Find the length of the longest consecutive elements sequence using hash map.

title: Binary Search
description: Search for a target in a sorted array using binary search.

title: Search in Rotated Sorted Array
description: Search a target in a rotated sorted array using binary search.

title: Find First and Last Position of Element
description: Find first and last occurrence of a target using binary search.

title: Median of Two Sorted Arrays
description: Find median of two sorted arrays using binary search.

title: Valid Parentheses
description: Check if parentheses are valid using a stack.

title: Daily Temperatures
description: Find how many days until a warmer temperature using a stack.

title: Largest Rectangle in Histogram
description: Find the largest rectangle area using a monotonic stack.

title: Next Greater Element I
description: Find the next greater element using a stack.

title: Reverse Linked List
description: Reverse a singly linked list iteratively.

title: Merge Two Sorted Lists
description: Merge two sorted linked lists using two pointers.

title: Linked List Cycle
description: Detect a cycle in a linked list using fast and slow pointers.

title: Remove Nth Node From End of List
description: Remove the nth node from end using two pointers.

title: Maximum Depth of Binary Tree
description: Find the maximum depth of a binary tree using DFS.

title: Invert Binary Tree
description: Invert a binary tree recursively.

title: Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Tree
description: Find LCA of two nodes in a binary tree using DFS.

title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
description: Traverse a binary tree level by level using BFS.

title: Validate Binary Search Tree
description: Check if a binary tree is a valid BST.

title: Number of Islands
description: Count islands in a grid using DFS or BFS.

title: Clone Graph
description: Clone an undirected graph using DFS or BFS.

title: Course Schedule
description: Determine if courses can be finished using topological sort.

title: Word Ladder
description: Find the shortest transformation sequence using BFS.

title: Pacific Atlantic Water Flow
description: Find cells that can flow to both oceans using DFS.

title: Top K Frequent Elements
description: Find the k most frequent elements using heap.

title: Kth Largest Element in an Array
description: Find the kth largest element using heap.

title: Merge K Sorted Lists
description: Merge k sorted linked lists using heap.

title: Jump Game
description: Determine if you can reach the last index using greedy.

title: Merge Intervals
description: Merge overlapping intervals using greedy strategy.

title: Gas Station
description: Find starting gas station using greedy approach.

title: Climbing Stairs
description: Count ways to climb stairs using dynamic programming.

title: House Robber
description: Find maximum amount robbed without robbing adjacent houses.

title: Coin Change
description: Find minimum coins to make a given amount using DP.

title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
description: Find the length of LIS using DP.

title: Edit Distance
description: Compute minimum operations to convert one string to another.

title: Unique Paths
description: Count unique paths in a grid using DP.

title: Partition Equal Subset Sum
description: Check if array can be partitioned into equal sum subsets using DP.
